title: Why is it taking so long for my end-game screen to load?
body: This just started today and I now have to wait about an extra 30 seconds for my end-game screen to load.

replies.body: Hmmmmm you might have "close client during game" turned on in your client options. Check for that in through the gear in the upper right hand corner on the client, and turn that off if it's checked. Test it in a practice game and let me know if that after match lobby loads quicker!
the problem started since the last patch
Yeah is still have this problem is there any fix out there?
I just started having the same issue too
I've been having the same issue. It started when I downloaded patch 7.10. Hope there's a fix soon.
